summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 RELIANCE TRANSFER TRAILER CHASSIS.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FRAME OF THE TRAILER CONSTANTLY CRACKED.  THE FAILURE HAD BEEN REPAIRED FIVE TIMES.  HE ALSO STATED THAT THE HITCH BRAKE FAILED.  THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THE TRAILER WAS REPAIRED, YET THE FAILURE PERSISTS.  NO OTHER VEHICLE INFORMATION WAS APPLICABLE.
